channel.title: Need help with torvapkz source
channel.description:
hey guys i have been trying to make a server with the torvapkz source and i am trying to find where i can edit the bank so it doesnt say the bank of torvapkz and try and find where i can make the pk guy not move and edit the name in it so if you know can you please tell me:
1. how to change the bank name
2. how to stop the pk guy from moving and edit the name of it
thanks
